summary: Tarius is a dark elf mage who will serve you as a companion. This mod also contains a small quest, which you get from Tarius.
descriptionHtml:
Tarius the Mage:
He can be found at Riverwood in the inn.
This mod adds:
-  A dark elf called \"Tarius the Mage\" who is a follower.
-  A small quest which hast something to do with Tarius.

INSTALL:
Just copy Tarius_the_Mage.esp to your Skyrim/Data directory.(for example C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)

UNINSTALL:
Delete Tarius_the_Mage.esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: AutGamer96
